mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user ORDER BY user_id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(user_id, email, google_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth, password_hash, password_date, profile_photo, last_login_dtg, created_dtg, updated_dtg, version ) values(#{userId}, #{email}, #{google_id}, #{first_name}, #{last_name}, #{date_of_birth}, #{password_hash}, #{password_date}, #{profile_photo}, #{last_login_dtg}, #{created_dtg}, #{updated_dtg}, #{version} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET google_id=#{google_id}, first_name=#{first_name}, last_name=#{last_name}, date_of_birth=#{date_of_birth}, password_hash=#{password_hash}, password_date=#{password_date}, profile_photo=#{profile_photo}, last_login_dtg=#{last_login_dtg}, created_dtg=#{created_dtg}, updated_dtg=#{updated_dtg}, version=#{version}+1 WHERE id=#{id} AND version=#{version}
